sentences.sContent: The tender shoots and the expanding flowers are nipped and withered, and of a vine that yearned to stretch its tendril round the world there is left but a sapless stump.
sentences.sContent_eng: The tender shoots and the expanding flowers are nipped and withered, and of a vine that yearned to stretch its tendril round the world there is left but a sapless stump.
sentences.sCn: 柔弱的嫩芽和绽放的花朵已经被掐断，枯萎败落，曾想将自己的卷须伸展到全世界的蔓藤，如今只剩下干瘪的残枝委地。

synos.tran: 枯萎的；无生气的；无价值的

words.tran: [植] 树液；精力，元气；活力；坑道
使衰竭，使伤元气；挖掘以破坏基础
